name: Aeon Anthology
description:
This is my very first RPG I have ever made and I had a blast doing it.

Aeon Anthology is a dungeon crawler RPG with 100 floors for you to traverse. It utilizes a job class system with 20 jobs and sub-jobs for you to mix and match.

Develop your characters, craft over 100 pieces of weapons and armor, upgrade the town to unlock more features, all while traversing 100 floors to end the curse once and for all!

This game was my passion project during the pandemic and I want to use it as a way to give back. 100 percent of any and all proceeds made will be used to plant trees as a way to help create a more responsible and sustainable future.
